title: UPDATE: 14-year-old girl dies after shooting range incident at MacLean Bottoms
content:
BISMARCK, ND - The Burleigh County Sheriff's Department has released more information about the death after a shooting incident Sunday morning at MacLean Bottoms Shooting Range.
They say the victim was a 14-year-old Bismarck girl.
The department says a preliminary report suggests it was an accidental shooting.
Burleigh County Sheriff's Department and North Dakota Game and Fish are jointly investigating the incident.
